TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace>
Public Class FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection Inherits Collection(Of FileDialogCustomPlace)

summary.span: 代表 類別的 Windows Vista 自訂位置集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]，這個類別並沒有任何影響。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: 將自訂位置加入至 集合。

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會針對特定的自訂位置新增資料夾並不是系統或應用程式的各種變更。The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. 資料夾會放置在自訂位置加入到的順序。The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . 最後一個新增會在頂端。The last one added will be at the top. 如果您將自訂位置加入不存在於執行應用程式的電腦集合時，不會顯示自訂的位置。If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown. Guid 是不區分大小寫。GUIDs are case-insensitive. 取得一份可用[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]已知的資料夾，請參閱[檔案對話方塊自訂位置的已知資料夾 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md)中的 KnownFolders.h 檔案或[!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]。For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會針對特定的自訂位置新增資料夾並不是系統或應用程式的各種變更。The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. 資料夾會放置在自訂位置加入到的順序。The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . 最後一個新增會在頂端。The last one added will be at the top. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
